item.title: Vavoom!
item.description:
At my ‘jobby job’ I am fortunate enough to have made not one but two File -> New Project iOS apps targeting modern iOS with Swift 6. We test and iterate fairly quickly on these tool-like applications. Risk of deployment of these apps is also low due to them being internal. In this vein I have been searching for a lightweight, fast and robust way to make these applications.

View as View Model

Shifting View Paradigm
